titles: Die Sabbathi, 26 Augusti, 1643. Whereas divers persons have beene assessed upon the Ordinances of Parliament, for the twentieth part, and weekely assessement, subsidies, and other payments; ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: August 28. London Printed for John VVright, in the Old-bailey,
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An Order of Parliament respecting those who refuse to pay the weekly assessment.
Order to print dated: Die Sabbathi, 26 Augusti, 1643; and signed: Joh. Browne Cler. Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
